properties.address: Alcester Library, Alcester, Warwickshire B49 5DZ
properties.description: Warwickshire Libraries, offer a comfortable safe environment for everyone to use and our free services will help to keep some of your costs down. You don’t need to be a library member to visit – just pop in. Choose to spend time reading, studying, working and using free library WiFi; tackle a jigsaw, play a board game, become absorbed in mindfulness colouring or join in our free library events and activities for all ages to make friends or learn something new.
properties.title: Alcester Library and Information Centre

properties.address: Alcester Methodist Church, Warwickshire B49 5DX
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 28th November 2023** Begins at 10 for drinks and cakes. At 12.30 we start to serve soup and a roll until 1.30. Everyone is welcome at any time between 10 and 2
properties.title: Alcester Methodist Church

properties.address: Church House, Warwickshire, Warwickshire B49 5AL B49 5AL
properties.description: Church House is a ground floor meeting room on Butter Street, Alcester. We offer a soup and bread lunch at 1pm each Wednesday, and are open for coffee/tea and other refreshments and snacks from 11.30am to 3pm. At 3 pm anyone is welcome to join us for a short reflective moment. Other churches and organisations in Alcester are offering opening times on different days of the week. See https://www.alcester-tc.gov.uk/health-and-wellbeing/health-and-wellbeing-information-page/ for details.
properties.title: Alcester St Nicholas Church Warm Welcome

properties.address: Elmley Castle Village Hall, Pershore, Worcestershire WR10 3HW
properties.description: Village Hall with one large hall, a small hall, a kitchen and toilet facilities. Also 2 small rooms, that could be developed into a more cosy environment

hours._text: Monday: 14:00 - 15:30 Monthly, Wednesday: 12:15 - 13:45 Monthly, Thursday: 09:30 - 11:30 Monthly

properties.address: Oat Street, Evesham, Worcestershire WR11 4PJ
properties.description: Our library offers a large collection of books for adults and children, free WiFi and access to computers. Coffee Morning/Warm Hub

Coffee, cake and chat. No charge, donations accepted.

This information is provided by a community group so it is advisable to check opening times with them directly, particularly over holiday periods.
properties.title: Wixford Village Hall

properties.address: Alcester Methodist Church Priory Rd Alcester B49 5DX
properties.description:
This is a free event (although we do accept donations) open to anyone in the community to chat, do crafts, play games and get to know one another. In November we extend our opening hours once a month (possibly more) for a Lunch Club, where we have soup, roll and cake.
We can have up to 35 people in the morning and up to 12 staying for lunch – we hope to increase that this year.

This information is provided by a community group so it is advisable to check opening times with them directly, particularly over holiday periods.

hours._text: Every Tuesday, 10.00am - 12.00 noon all year round, and 10.00am - 2.00pm from November to March

properties.title: Alcester Methodist Church Open Morning

properties.address: Ambleside Care Home, Evesham Road, Stratford upon Avon, CV37 9TG
properties.description:
Free Entry, Free Parking,

10.00 – 12.00 noon: Dementia Friendly Community Café. A chance to make new friends over a tea or coffee with other refreshments provided. A chance to meet people who are in a similar circumstance and make those vital connections out in the community.

2.30 – 4.30pm: Knit and Natter. Those that attend the knit and natter group knit blankets and donate them to worthy causes. This is free to attend and coffee and refreshments are provided. It’s a chance to feel part of something and make new friends along the way.

This information is provided by a community group so it is advisable to check opening times with them directly, particularly over holiday periods.

hours._text: Every third Thursday of the Month 10am - 12noon

properties.title: Dementia Friendly Community Cafe

properties.address: Globe House, Priory Road, Alcester B49 5DZ
properties.description:
Coffee Mornings – every 3rd Monday of the month, 10am. Just drop in, no need to book for a speaker on a topic of local interest, and free hot drinks and biscuits.

Crafternoon Tea/Warm Hub – every Friday 1.30-3.30pm. Bring your own craft project along and join our friendly group, or just pop in for games, puzzles and mindful colouring. Free hot drinks and biscuits are provided.

The library is open to all, on Mondays, Wednesdays, Thursdays, Fridays 9.30am – 5.30pm and Saturdays 10am – 1pm. It is a warm, safe space with access to free wifi and a range of activities and resources. It is free to join the library, and for library members to borrow books and use a computer on site.

This information is provided by a community group so it is advisable to check opening times with them directly, particularly over holiday periods.

hours._text: Every Third Monday of the Month at 10am (Coffee Morning) and Every Friday (Crafternoon Tea/Warm Hub) 1:30pm - 3.30pm

Community Hub
